item.title: About me
item.description: Deliberate jack-of-a-few-trades, master of none. Education Undergraduate @ Seoul National University, Seoul, Korea (2012.03 - present) Major in Economics and Computer Science Now taking a gap year in 2019 Experience Research Intern @ Vision & Learning Lab in SNU (July 2018 â€“ Dec 2018) Participated in data gathering, analysis and demo page for the NLP dataset paper AudioCaps: Generating Captions for Audios in The Wild Chris Dongjoo Kim, Byeongchang Kim, Hyunmin Lee, and Gunhee Kim NAACL-HLT 2019 (Oral) Undergraduate Intern @ Computer Architecture & Embedded Systems Lab in SNU (June 2017 â€“ Aug 2017) Implemented Y86-64, 64-bit X86 simulator Works HCG, Seoul, Korea (July 2017 - Aug 2018, Feb 2019 - present) Developing a human resource management tool, Performance Plus Web frontend, Rails api server, AWS deploy automation Ruby on Rails, MySQL, Nginx, Redis, Docker, React Triamilia (Jan 2019) Developed a online shopping mall for shampoo, collaborated with JUNO Hair Ruby on Rails, MySQL, Nginx, Docker, React Community SNULion (Mar 2016 - present) Studying Django(2019), previously taught Ruby on Rails(2017 - 2018) Rails model relationships seminar Projects Alggago (Aug 2017) 1st @ LikeLion stone flicking AI Competition Shashagungun (Dec 2016 -Feb 2017) Online school notice board Ruby on Rails, sqlite3 ETC Naverpay user dashboard (May 2018, Naver Campus Hackday) Ruby on Rails, MySQL Document Analyzer Static malware detection PDF, OLE, XML documents YARA, Python, Ruby on Rails Cooperated with Softcamp Assignment for 2018 spring, Creative Integrated Design 2, young-gil Shin JEM (June 2016 - Dec 2016) Prediction Market Ruby on Rails, sqlite3, Redis
